0.title: Sony VAIO VGN-FW41E H Silver 41 7 cm (16 4&quot;) 1600 x 900 pixels Intel® Core™2 Duo 4 GB DDR2-SDRAM 500 GB Windows Vista Home Premium
0.longdesc: Real wide viewing<br/> VAIO FW-Series radically enhances your multimedia entertainment with a revolutionary 16.4” real wide display.<br/> This large screen features Full HD resolution* and a true 16:9 aspect ratio for the best possible digital media experience. Enjoy movies, games, photo slideshows and the Internet like never before with intense realism and detail.<br/> The larger display is also ideal for the office. Open two full size Explorer windows side-by-side and multi-task with ease.<br/>  True-to-life pictures<br/> With latest X-black screen technology, FW-Series delivers pictures that are sharp, bright and natural looking. Images are true-to-life with vibrant colour, deep contrast and enhanced depth. Some models feature a double lamp for exceptional brightness and pin sharp detail.<br/> There are millions of colours in the world and these displays are capable or reproducing all of them. Super realistic 100% colour fidelity allows you to enjoy the best pictures ever with deeper blacks, brighter whites and an infinite range of colours. <br/>  High Definition with Blu-ray<br/> Take full advantage of a new era in high definition entertainment with FW-Series. Top models featuring an integrated Blu-ray Disc Drive allow playback of latest HD movies and give you the freedom to create your own dynamic productions captured on an HD camcorder. Store up to 50GB of multimedia data or over 9 hours of HD video on one disc using the Blu-ray Disc Drive.<br/> You can also enjoy HD movies on models featuring an integrated Blu-ray Disc Combo Drive. It also plays and records all your favourite CDs and DVDs. For a thrilling big screen experience, connect your laptop to an HD-Ready TV using HDMI output and watch favourite films in glorious Full HD 1080p picture quality.<br/>  Dolby Sound Room<br/> True home entertainment is more than just amazing pictures. Dolby Sound Room recreates the acoustics of a small theatre in your headphones so you can enjoy movies, music, and games in surround sound. <br/>  Slim and elegant<br/> For a laptop with a large 16.4" screen, FW is remarkably compact and transportable. An ultra thin bezel has been used to fit the screen onto a compact chassis with the screen closer than ever to the edge of the bezel for a slim and streamlined appearance.<br/> A beautiful cylindrical hinge design with battery and hinge designed as one keeps size and weight down to just 3.1 kilos while ensuring maximum strength at one of the most vulnerable points of the laptop.<br/>  Made in Magnesium<br/> Finished in durable and lightweight magnesium alloy, the thin-walled chassis of FW-Series preserves portability while providing rugged protection from shocks and knocks.<br/>  Precise typing<br/> An ergonomic isolation keyboard with keys protruding vertically from a beautifully carved flat surface enhances looks and ease of use. Typing is more comfortable than ever with no lateral movement and the centre of each key slightly indented to ensure each key stroke provides a solid and precise response. Optimum spacing between keys minimises typing errors, especially for those with long or manicured nails.<br/>  Multimedia powerhouse<br/> Enjoy powerful multimedia performance with Intel Core 2 Duo processors on all models. The flagship VGN-FW31ZJ includes a mega fast Intel Core 2 Duo T9550 processor.<br/> Plus with up to 4GB of DDR2 SDRAM memory, accessing data intensive files and working on graphical programs is easier than ever.<br/> Ultra efficient Intel Centrino 2 Processor technology across the range optimises battery life and gives you even more reliable wireless connectivity. Work and play longer on the move and communicate cable-free with friends and family wherever you go.<br/>  Impressive graphics<br/> Super smooth 3D performance is essential for multimedia entertainment. FW-Series compromises nothing with a fast and efficient ATI Mobility Radeon HD 3650 or HD3470 graphics card featuring up to 256MB of dedicated VRAM. Perfect for watching DVD’s, playing games and creating dynamic fun-filled presentations.<br/>  Faster wireless connectivity<br/> Communicate easily with friends, family and colleagues using the next generation of wireless technology. Intel Draft-n on most models gives up to five times faster wireless connectivity, more reliability and a wider reception range than 802.11a/b/g when connected to hotspots. Stream video wirelessly through your home without the need for any additional hardware or cables and keep in touch with confidence when on the move.<br/> All models also include Bluetooth for effortless connection and data exchange with other personal devices including mobile phones, laptops, mice and keyboards, printers, digital cameras and game consoles.<br/>  Store your multimedia<br/> You never need worry about running out of storage space with FW-Series. Hard disc capacity ranges from 250GB to a generous 500GB, giving you the freedom to store multitudes of video, still images, television programmes, music and other multimedia data.<br/> The VGN-FW11ZU (ZRU) ,VGN-FW21Z(ZR),VGN-FW21M(MR),VGN-FW21S(SR), VGN-FW31ZJ, VGN-FW31M and VGN-FW11S (SR) with Blu-ray Disc Drive can also store an additional 50GB of portable storage on one single DVD-sized disc – enough for over nine hours of HD video or 23 hours of standard definition TV.

__Result.longdesc:
Real wide viewing
VAIO FW-Series radically enhances your multimedia entertainment with a revolutionary 16.4” real wide display.
This large screen features Full HD resolution* and a true 16:9 aspect ratio for the best possible digital media experience. Enjoy movies, games, photo slideshows and the Internet like never before with intense realism and detail.
The larger display is also ideal for the office. Open two full size Explorer windows side-by-side and multi-task with ease.
True-to-life pictures
With latest X-black screen technology, FW-Series delivers pictures that are sharp, bright and natural looking. Images are true-to-life with vibrant colour, deep contrast and enhanced depth. Some models feature a double lamp for exceptional brightness and pin sharp detail.
There are millions of colours in the world and these displays are capable or reproducing all of them. Super realistic 100% colour fidelity allows you to enjoy the best pictures ever with deeper blacks, brighter whites and an infinite range of colours.
High Definition with Blu-ray
Take full advantage of a new era in high definition entertainment with FW-Series. Top models featuring an integrated Blu-ray Disc Drive allow playback of latest HD movies and give you the freedom to create your own dynamic productions captured on an HD camcorder. Store up to 50GB of multimedia data or over 9 hours of HD video on one disc using the Blu-ray Disc Drive.
You can also enjoy HD movies on models featuring an integrated Blu-ray Disc Combo Drive. It also plays and records all your favourite CDs and DVDs. For a thrilling big screen experience, connect your laptop to an HD-Ready TV using HDMI output and watch favourite films in glorious Full HD 1080p picture quality.
Dolby Sound Room
True home entertainment is more than just amazing pictures. Dolby Sound Room recreates the acoustics of a small theatre in your headphones so you can enjoy movies, music, and games in surround sound.
Slim and elegant
For a laptop with a large 16.4" screen, FW is remarkably compact and transportable. An ultra thin bezel has been used to fit the screen onto a compact chassis with the screen closer than ever to the edge of the bezel for a slim and streamlined appearance.
A beautiful cylindrical hinge design with battery and hinge designed as one keeps size and weight down to just 3.1 kilos while ensuring maximum strength at one of the most vulnerable points of the laptop.
Made in Magnesium
Finished in durable and lightweight magnesium alloy, the thin-walled chassis of FW-Series preserves portability while providing rugged protection from shocks and knocks.
Precise typing
An ergonomic isolation keyboard with keys protruding vertically from a beautifully carved flat surface enhances looks and ease of use. Typing is more comfortable than ever with no lateral movement and the centre of each key slightly indented to ensure each key stroke provides a solid and precise response. Optimum spacing between keys minimises typing errors, especially for those with long or manicured nails.
Multimedia powerhouse
Enjoy powerful multimedia performance with Intel Core 2 Duo processors on all models. The flagship VGN-FW31ZJ includes a mega fast Intel Core 2 Duo T9550 processor.
Plus with up to 4GB of DDR2 SDRAM memory, accessing data intensive files and working on graphical programs is easier than ever.
Ultra efficient Intel Centrino 2 Processor technology across the range optimises battery life and gives you even more reliable wireless connectivity. Work and play longer on the move and communicate cable-free with friends and family wherever you go.
Impressive graphics
Super smooth 3D performance is essential for multimedia entertainment. FW-Series compromises nothing with a fast and efficient ATI Mobility Radeon HD 3650 or HD3470 graphics card featuring up to 256MB of dedicated VRAM. Perfect for watching DVD’s, playing games and creating dynamic fun-filled presentations.
Faster wireless connectivity
Communicate easily with friends, family and colleagues using the next generation of wireless technology. Intel Draft-n on most models gives up to five times faster wireless connectivity, more reliability and a wider reception range than 802.11a/b/g when connected to hotspots. Stream video wirelessly through your home without the need for any additional hardware or cables and keep in touch with confidence when on the move.
All models also include Bluetooth for effortless connection and data exchange with other personal devices including mobile phones, laptops, mice and keyboards, printers, digital cameras and game consoles.
Store your multimedia
You never need worry about running out of storage space with FW-Series. Hard disc capacity ranges from 250GB to a generous 500GB, giving you the freedom to store multitudes of video, still images, television programmes, music and other multimedia data.
The VGN-FW11ZU (ZRU) ,VGN-FW21Z(ZR),VGN-FW21M(MR),VGN-FW21S(SR), VGN-FW31ZJ, VGN-FW31M and VGN-FW11S (SR) with Blu-ray Disc Drive can also store an additional 50GB of portable storage on one single DVD-sized disc – enough for over nine hours of HD video or 23 hours of standard definition TV.
__Result.longdesc2: Sony VAIO VAIO VGN-FW41E/H. Processor family: Intel® Core™2 Duo, Processor model: T6400, Processor frequency: 2 GHz. Display diagonal: 41.7 cm (16.4"), HD type: HD+, Display resolution: 1600 x 900 pixels. Internal memory: 4 GB, Internal memory type: DDR2-SDRAM. Total storage capacity: 500 GB. Discrete graphics adapter. Operating system installed: Windows Vista Home Premium. Product colour: Silver. Weight: 3.3 kg

properties.propdesc: Intel Virtualization Technology for Directed I/O (VT-d)
Intel VT-x with Extended Page Tables (EPT)
Intel® Clear Video HD Technology (Intel® CVT HD)
Intel® Clear Video Technology for Mobile Internet Devices (Intel CVT for MID)
Intel® Hyper Threading Technology (Intel® HT Technology)
